content.rendered:
Android applications are now increasing day by day and now there are more than 1 million apps in play store. It is hard to find the best app for you and which is actually useful. Today I am going to help you out to find your misplaced phone and how easily you can schedule a call and message to anyone.

You might have faced the problem sometime to remember to call someone or forgot to call or message. This is usual and being human it’s natural to forget things unless we put a reminder. There are many apps for such purpose, but the reminder app for calling and messaging is rare and very much useful.

While browsing Play Store I found one such application that works fine and User experience is good, its Free Call & SMS Scheduler Android app. I found it interesting and has following features

  • Smart user interface
  • Easy to schedule a call or message
  • Set speaker and vibration alarm
  • Nothing to remember once scheduled

The app is developed by Cubix who has developed many other interesting apps.

Moving further, now what if you misplaced your phone in your house, workplace or forgot after setting it to silent mode below the paper or under the pillow? It would be hard to find it!!!

I was thinking like that, but now it’s more fun, just whistle and your phone will respond even if it’s in silent mode.

YES!!! It’s true. You just need to whistle and the phone will respond with a preset tone or music from your phone.

Whistle Phone Finder It’s a FREE android App in Play Store with downloads of 100,000+ and 5000+ reviews. The app has many interesting features which are as follows.

  • Smart user interface
  • Set the sensitivity level (high, medium, & low)
  • Set sound from the app or from the phone
  • 6 different themes to set
  • Inbuilt Flashlight (No need to install any flash app)
  • Flashlight widget available

Both are interesting apps and must be installed on every phone!!!

What do you think about it? Just share your thoughts in the comments.
